acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This item was transferred on 24 August 1992.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of a letter from Donald G. Mitchell [Ik Marvel], "Edgewood," New Haven, Connecticut, to Mrs. Charles Coit, Norwich, Connecticut, sending a copy of the 'Woodbridge Record.'
